item.title: Why Look For Fiber Lit Buildings?
item.description:
“Fiber lit building” refers to a building already equipped with fiber optic service. This is a significant advantage because it provides access to high-bandwidth internet without expensive installation costs. To find these buildings, you can use the Ethernet Buildings Lit Building Locator. This online tool acts as a map to locate buildings with existing high-bandwidth infrastructure. Fiber optic connections offer almost limitless bandwidth potential. While renting an office space won’t likely provide terabits per second, fiber connections can readily handle Gigabit Ethernet, 10 GigE, and even multiplexed connections for significantly higher capacity...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/why-look-for-fiber-lit-buildings/
